name: Shooter Shooters
description:
Shoot em' all, reach your highest point!

Feel the real taste of Rocky's space adventure, with aliens and monsters along their way. Shoot as many monsters as possible and protect Rocky's spaceship by dodging their bullets! Remember that you only have 4 shields for the entire adventure.

Controls: You can control Rocky's spaceship by moving your mouse/touchpad left and right. Bullets are automatically fired according to spaceship's position. Aim the bullet to monster's ship to destroy them.

Credits:

Assets: Angega Studio's Patreon (https://www.patreon.com/posts/14292162)

Source Code: https://github.com/izznfkhrlislm/shooter-shooters
